barcelona_target: By 2030, promote social, economic and political inclusion for all
target_line_2030: Reduce the perception or feeling of loneliness to below 6%, for both the adult population and people over the age of 64
target_name: Empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, gender, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 894kB)
page_content:
**Note**

The UCLA (University of California at Los Angeles) index is a global measure of the feeling of loneliness based on three dimensions: relational loneliness, social loneliness and feeling isolated
